00110         (pts[i+1] > 0.0)
00111         && (pts[i+2] > 0.0) &&

00157     pts[(3*i)+1] = (((double)(linOct[i].getY())) +0.5)/((double)(1u << maxDepth));
00158     pts[(3*i)+2] = (((double)(linOct[i].getZ())) +0.5)/((double)(1u << maxDepth));
00159   }//end for i

00216   }
00217   balOct.clear();
00218

00221 
00222 double gaussian(double mean, double std_deviation) {
00223   static double t1 = 0, t2=0;
00224   double x1, x2, x3, r;
00225 
00226   using namespace std;
00227 
00228   // reuse previous calculations
00229   if(t1) {
00230     const double tmp = t1;
00231     t1 = 0;
00232     return mean + std_deviation * tmp;
00233   }
00234   if(t2) {
00235     const double tmp = t2;
00236     t2 = 0;
00237     return mean + std_deviation * tmp;
00238   }
00239 
00240   // pick randomly a point inside the unit disk
00241   do {
00242     x1 = 2 * drand48() - 1;
00243     x2 = 2 * drand48() - 1;
00244     x3 = 2 * drand48() - 1;
00245     r = x1 * x1 + x2 * x2 + x3*x3;
00246   } while(r >= 1);
00247 
00248   // Box-Muller transform
00249   r = sqrt(-2.0 * log(r) / r);
00250 
00251   // save for next call
00252   t1 = (r * x2);
00253   t2 = (r * x3);
00254 
00255   return mean + (std_deviation * r * x1);
00256 }//end gaussian
